name: Whitogether
description:
Entry for the GMTK Jam 2021

Whitogether is a game where the two characters, WhitO e BlackO, are trying to find themselves in a world where they are separated by their differences, but they can only move together. Everytime they find themselves, this world rearranges itself making it harder and harder for the two to stay together. They need each other and your coordination for the two to join together for eternity.

Credits

Narrative, Art and animations: Gustavo Tasca Pigosso

Game Desing and programming : Bruno Dal'Lago

Music: Luiz Felipe Dal Zotto

Project management: Perceu Bertoletti
